name: .NDTX
summary: Learn about .NDTX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open NDTX files with Nevron Software MyDraw in Windows and macOS by selecting File → Open.
You can convert an NDTX drawing to various formats with MyDraw, such as .JPEG, .PNG, .EMF, .SVG, .VSDX, .DXF, and .PDF. To convert an NDTX file, select File → Export.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .ndtx file in Nevron Software MyDraw 5
images.caption: NDTX file open in Nevron Software MyDraw 5
